revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 46:;Aphrodous, daughter of Pnepheros through the agency of Hermias (Beleketouis);;(in left margin: drachmas 104 obols 11) tax on gathered vine for the 12th year;;apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, naubion obols 1.5, surcharges obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 7 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;harvest tax for the property of Maikenatiane in the 12th year;;apomoira drachmas 6 obol 1.5, naubion obols 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 12 obol 4.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 15 obols 3.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1, in total drachmas 16 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;the same (property):;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 11 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 4.5, naubion drachma 1 obol 1, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 7 obols 3, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 2.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 25 obols 3.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 28 obols 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 29 obols 5.5;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obol 1.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2;;Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;; in total for the day drachmas 292 obols 21;;(Pharmouthi) 6 likewise:;Kastor, son of Petheus (daughter of Chairemon, son of Oumasales);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 4 obols 4.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 3.5, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 3)eparourion drachmas 3 obols 1 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 10 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12, surcharges obols 4.5, in total drachmas 12 obols 4.5;;Tamystha, daughter of Sambas (Helemous, daughter of Psansabatis);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 13) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 8;;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Isidoros, son of Hatres (Tilouksis);;(in left margin: obols 12) naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obol 1, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 2;;Maron, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Patkonnis, grandson of Arobros, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Teberis, grandson of Sambathion, mother Isidora, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;Petallion, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petallion, mother Tepheros, drachmas 8."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
